overview: A true morbidly funny and heartwarming fantastical journey of the homeless dog Mima from Skid Row in Los Angeles setting out to find a new home! Great Dog Voices by Disney's own Kimberly Brooks, "Ten Things I Hate ABout You" Andrew Keegan, Noah Nelson and Deena Freeman! When you purchase this movie you automatically support DownTown Dog rescue!
title: A Dog's Life
